thread.title: Shirlee
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Shirlee

author: Shirlee
title: Shirlee
text: I am very happy with the service that David Sklar provided. Rhoda at the Mississauga office has been extremely helpful and kind through this entire process. She is prompt at replying to email questions and explained everything to me in detail. I am so thankful to Rhoda and David Sklar and Assocociates for all of your assistance.
